filter
Class AppendKeywordFilter

java.lang.Object
  com.amazonaws.mturk.filter.Filter
      filter.AppendKeywordFilter

public class AppendKeywordFilter
extends Filter

This filter extends the Filter class and implements the execute method. It checks if the createHIT operation is being called and appends 'myHIT' to set of keywords of the HIT being created
